value-proposition: Keep your documentation green and fresh
app-description: Effortlessly manage and maintain documentation with Evergreen Docs - the Github App that automates updates, generates READMEs, translates docs, and keeps a changelog, all based on contextual data from your repository.

pricing.title: Pricing
pricing.value-proposition: Flat price to help every team keep their projects evergreen
pricing.description: Users save significant time and effort by automating the writing of documentation, allowing them to focus on more important tasks and minimize the hassle of writing and maintaining documentation.
